message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $175. This exceptional value includes not only the product itself but also exclusive access to our VIP customer service and a special gift. We believe this offer presents an excellent opportunity for you to experience the benefits of our product at a competitive price.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're offering, but $175 is a bit higher than my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. In light of this, I am willing to reconsider our previous discussion. For a limited time, I am offering the product for $160, which includes free shipping and a 30-day satisfaction guarantee. Please let me know if this revised offer meets your expectations.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility and the added benefits.  However, $160 is still a little more than I'm comfortable spending.  I'm sticking with my offer of $150.  Let me know if you're willing to accept that.
